name: Brobots (none1249)
description:
Brobots is a twin platformer game, or at least I call it so. In this game, you will control two characters at once. 

To complete a level you need to make it to two doors on the other side of the course, both characters need to be at the doors at the same time to complete the level.

There are 6 levels in the game

It is my first game so any critique or suggestions are welcome

Thank you for playing!

Controls:

Move:  arrow keys

Jump:  Space/LShift keys

PS: Some levels can be hard maybe too hard, so if anyone struggles write in the comments so I can make them a bit less hard
